programme.desc: 'S17/E31 - Jelly Gems Taste Test Immunity Challenge'. Apart from Laura, the contestants take part in a two-round immunity cook.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent

programme.title: Elsbeth

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: 'S17/E31 - Jelly Gems Taste Test Immunity Challenge'. Apart from Laura, the contestants take part in a two-round immunity cook.

programme.title: Doc

programme.title: Next Level Chef

programme.title: Suits LA
programme.desc: 'S1/E9 - Bat Signal'. Ted and Harvey team up to right a wrong from their past and put a monster behind bars. Stuart confronts the possibility he may have unwittingly helped a client commit a crime.

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: 'S22/E15 - Moonlit'. After a Navy Lieutenant's death reveals ties to Special Agent Sawyer, Torres and Knight uncover a murder linked to a wealthy family. Meanwhile, Parker discovers a connection between his mother's death and Lily.

programme.title: MasterChef Australia
programme.desc: 'S17/E32 - Sweet Nostalgia Elimination Challenge'. The contestants, apart from Laura and Callum, have 75 minutes to cook a dessert inspired by their childhood memories.

programme.title: Alert: Missing Persons Unit
programme.desc: 'S3/E8 - Badge #41870'. Violet Casso, who suffers from mental illness, has gone missing without her meds. She robs a till at a convenience store.

programme.title: FBI: International
programme.desc: 'S4/E3 - Nothing Sudden About It'. When an American teenager disappears from a beach party during her senior year trip to Portugal, the Fly Team heads up the search.

programme.title: Dexter: Original Sin
programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Miami Vice'. Dexter goes after a loan shark with ties to Batista, as Harry is told to keep an eye on Miami Metro's newest homicide detective. Deb throws a party to win the favour of her volleyball teammates.

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: 'S7/E11 - A Hundredweight Of Stones'. Claire turns to John Grey for comfort as they process difficult news. Ian and Rachel discuss their love and their future. Brianna confronts an intruder at Lallybroch.

programme.title: Hysteria!
programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Can I Play With Madness?'. Dethkrunch hosts a Satanic cult meeting as Linda tries to understand what's happening to her.

programme.title: Land Of Bad
programme.desc: Luke and Liam Hemsworth, and Russell Crowe drive this action movie. A US Army special forces unit is ambushed during a mission- their only hope - a remote Air Force drone operator.

programme.title: The End We Start From
programme.desc: Jodie Comer's performance propels this compelling story of a family's survival. As flood waters submerge London, a mother and child are forced to leave home in search of safety.

programme.title: Songbird

programme.title: Paint

programme.title: Invitation To A Murder

programme.title: Not Your Romeo & Juliet

programme.title: The One
programme.desc: Based on a true story of survival. A woman returning from her honeymoon survives a plane crash. Injured and chased by a tiger, she needs another miracle to survive.

programme.title: Here Before
programme.desc: A gripping film filled with mystery and drama. A troubled woman develops an obsession with her new neighbour's daughter, believing she's the reincarnation of her deceased daughter.

programme.title: Dolphin Boy
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. A little boy is rescued and raised by dolphins after surviving a plane crash, but his joyful marine life is upended by an evil octopus.

programme.title: Ad Astra
programme.desc: Brad Pitt drives this exhilarating space epic. An astronaut is sent across the solar system on a mission to uncover the truth about his missing father's doomed expedition.

programme.title: Playboy Cops
programme.desc: Two eccentric young detectives search for a killer to bring him to justice while vying for the affections of a young woman.

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits' tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Operation Bangkok
programme.desc: A military veteran and an undercover cop lead a team to rescue the hostages captured by a band of thugs in an island outside of Bangkok.

programme.title: In the Line of Duty III
programme.desc: Two notorious thieves escape to Hong Kong after committing a jewellery heist in Japan. Madam Yeung and a Japanese inspector must team up to bring them to justice.

programme.title: The Dead And The Deadly
programme.desc: A murderous plot to claim the fortune of a wealthy family is thwarted when the spirit of the victim enters the body of a young sorcerer to take revenge.

programme.title: 3AM The Office
programme.desc: A newcomer offends the ghosts in his office on his first day at work and experiences spooky encounters during night shifts, making him reflect on his behaviour.

programme.title: Triad
programme.desc: Hong Kong's up-and-coming actor William Chan stars as a gangster rise through the ranks and become the no.1 triad gangster in Hong Kong!

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented granny's apartment as a stakeout location develop romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man evades an arranged marriage to go to Shaolin Temple, where he joins other disciples to fight against an expelled disciple taking revenge on the Abbot.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxer's spirit in his master?

programme.title: Kung Fu Angels
programme.desc: A spoiled girl is transferred to a new sports school where she meets a handsome kung fu team captain and decides to try wushu. Little does she know that would change her life.

programme.title: Fire of Conscience
programme.desc: Detective Manfred teams up with Inspector Kee to investigate a homicide. As corruption surfaces, Manfred unravels a web of deceit that puts the Hong Kong Police Force at risk.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: An Inspector wants to stop a huge money heist led by an escaped convict but ends up engaging in a cat-and-mouse game with him.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: An Inspector wants to stop a huge money heist led by an escaped convict but ends up engaging in a cat-and-mouse game with him.

programme.title: Undercover Punch And Gun
programme.desc: An undercover police officer teams up with unlikely allies in order to fight a powerful drug dealer and take down a drug smuggling ring.

programme.title: Gun N' Rose
programme.desc: A Taiwanese gang boss names his adopted son Long Yi as his successor. This provokes Long Er (his biological son) to murder his father. Long Yi must now confront Long Er in a final battle.

programme.title: Cat And Mouse
programme.desc: An unemployed actor who is being supported by his wife runs around town with his friends attempting to pick up various women with tall tales of his success.

programme.title: My Heart is That Eternal Rose
programme.desc: A professional killer reunites with his ex-lover (who has become the mistress of a kingpin).

programme.title: The Most Wanted
programme.desc: A botched police raid leads to the betrayal of an undercover cop. As he is put on the most wanted list by both police and the triad, can he prove his innocence?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartel's turf war.

programme.title: The Avenging Fist
programme.desc: A young man uses the martial arts skill created by his father, and the Power Glove, a tool that unleashes mind power, to battle rebels who intend to dominate the world.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu. Guan must fight for Cao but is allowed to escort Liu's concubine to safety, in a dangerous journey.

programme.title: Righting Wrongs
programme.desc: A lawyer decides to take the law into his own hands when a witness and his family are murdered.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Executioners
programme.desc: An evil deformed villain controls Hong Kong's scarce water supply, so the trio of Wonder Woman, Thief Catcher and Invisible Woman must team up and save the city.

programme.title: 3AM The Campus
programme.desc: A school girl joins a horror video project filmed in an old building near her campus to take revenge on a bullying gang, even at the expense of sacrificing the innocents...

programme.title: Helios
programme.desc: When the notorious criminal, Helios steals a powerful weapon from South Korea and attempts to sell it in Hong Kong, the police forces of these two lands must join hands.

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: Enter The Girl Dragon
programme.desc: Pooja, a big fan of Bruce Lee, practises jeet kune do to become a skilled martial artist. When her boyfriend is kidnapped by the mafia, she must fight back to save him.

programme.title: Mr Vampire II
programme.desc: Dr Lam diagnoses the latest phenomenon as more citizens become 'infected'. He decides to stop the vampires from turning more citizens.

programme.title: Motorway

programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fa's mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: Return Of The Lucky Stars

programme.desc: 'S5/E7 of 20 - Birthright'. When an elderly man suffering from Alzheimer's is robbed, Magnum and Higgins go to investigate, while T.C. tries to overcome a past trauma.

programme.desc: 'S1/E7 of 18 - Fashion Police'. While looking into a murder case, Riggs and Murtaugh find themselves following the trail to a dangerous underground investigation led by the DEA.

programme.desc: 'S1/E7 of 130'. Muna's dream is under threat thanks to enemies of progress. An act of desperation causes strife in the Nwokoye household.

programme.desc: 'S4/E17 - Unforeseen'. In Florida, a felon breaks into an elementary school, causing a code red alert. A traffic stop in Arizona escalates when the suspects steal an ambulance to flee.

programme.title: Fatal Destination
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Where's Emily?'. A Vermont anniversary trip turns dark as a romantic getaway unravels into secrets, violence, and a camper crime scene.

programme.title: The Playboy Murders
programme.desc: 'S3/E4 - Terror At The Suncoast Club'. When a photographer is murdered right after shooting the 'Bunny of the Year' contest, the Playboy Bunnies fear that one of them could be next.

programme.title: Cold Hearted
programme.desc: 'S1/E4 - Blinding Fantasy'. Cory and Cat's marriage falls apart when she drains his bank account and leaves him for Michael. But when Cory is found dead, is it really a robbery gone wrong?

programme.title: Broken Trust

programme.desc: 'S10/E11'. In another first for this tenth season of Come Dine With Me SA, we are in Bloemfontein. The City of Roses hosts include Debra, Zizipho, Onyinye and John. Each of them is determined to showcase a memorable dining experience.

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: 'S19/E12'. It's the fourth quarter-final, and this week's most talented four cooks return to fight for a place in Knockout Week. They must cook for some of MasterChef's most inspiring winners and contestants.

programme.title: Nadiya's Simple Spices
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. Featuring spiced-up recipes to make you feel good - from a turmeric-infused seafood broth to a cheese and chilli loaf, as well as a luxurious cinnamon and rose cream cheesecake.

programme.title: Prue Leith's Cotswold Kitchen
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Sandi Toksvig'. Prue welcomes her pal Sandi Toksvig into her kitchen to cook two recipes from a 1920s pamphlet before whipping up a yoghurty dinner-party dessert.

programme.title: Jamie: Fast And Simple
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. Jamie makes a Korean-inspired Gochujang chicken traybake, shows us eight ways to use salmon fillets, creates a spectacular quesadilla toastie and tops it all off with a no-cook, banoffee fro-yo tart.

programme.title: MasterChef: The Professionals
programme.desc: 'S16/E10'. It's the last week of heats, and another four ambitious chefs go all out to impress Marcus, Monica and Gregg as their race for the title begins.

programme.title: Come Dine With Me: South Africa
programme.desc: 'S10/E11'. In another first for this tenth season of Come Dine With Me SA, we are in Bloemfontein. The City of Roses hosts include Debra, Zizipho, Onyinye and John. Each of them is determined to showcase a memorable dining experience.

programme.title: Big Bad Budget Battle
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Supermarket Shortcuts'. Three home cooks have just 20 minutes to make a signature shortcut dish and prepare a dinner to impress using Ree Drummond's favourite shortcuts.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: 'S52/E7 - Chuck Wagon Cook-Off'. Four chefs who love rustic wagon food compete to create boozy appetisers in the first round. Then, they're challenged to whip up a prickly dessert.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E6 - Nashville'. Andrew explores the country classics of Nashville, from hot chicken to chess pie. Other mainstays range from heaven-sent biscuits smothered in gravy to juicy barbecue.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E7 - Taipei'. Andrew explores the edible icons of Taipei, Taiwan, a place where the dumplings can be dangerous and who you share the meal with is as important as the meal itself.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E8 - Ho Chi Minh City'. Andrew unveils the cuisine of Ho Chi Minh City, the economic and cultural centre of Vietnam. The city has a rich history and the food lives up to its legacy.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E9 - Pittsburgh'. Andrew explores the favourite foods of Pittsburgh - home to a half-pound fish sandwich, as well as hearty recipes like kielbasa, stuffed cabbage and pierogi.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E10 - Veracruz'. Andrew explores the food of Veracruz, Mexico, by sampling Arroz a la tumbada, which includes a whole boiled octopus, as well as favourites like chile relleno and picaditas.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E11 - Managua'. Andrew reveals the must-try foods of Nicaragua's capital Managua. He tries a steamed beef dish called baho to the crispy pork skin-topped salad known as vigaron.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E12 - Santiago'. Andrew reveals the flavours of the culinary paradise of Santiago, Chile. He tries some of Santiago's signature dishes such as asado a la parrilla and pastel de jaiba.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E13 - Vienna'. Andrew samples the cuisine of Vienna and enjoys Sachertorte, an Austrian dessert dating back to the 1800s, and other classics such as schnitzel and frankfurter sausage.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E14 - Budapest'. Andrew travels to Budapest, to showcase this ancient city's most beloved foods, from classic stuffed cabbage to rich goulash and mouth-watering Transylvania chimney cake.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E15 - Rome'. Andrew explores the iconic foods of Rome, including deep-fried artichokes, spaghetti alla carbonara and pizza tonda. Each dish has a history that dates back hundreds of years.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S4/E16 - Dubai'. Andrew unveils the diverse delicacies of modern Dubai, such as marinated meat kababs and halwa, a rosewater-flavoured dessert known as a symbol of the region.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: 'S27/E10 - Classics Worth Cooking'. The hosts break down the classic dishes that every home cook can master. They include whole roasted chicken, salad niçoise and a T-bone steak.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: 'S52/E8 - Tiny But Mighty'. Four chefs go head-to-head to create small plates with big flavours! Can they turn dainty ingredients into delicious dishes without skimping on presentation?

programme.title: Bizarre Foods With Andrew Zimmern
programme.desc: 'S7/E6 - North Carolina's Moonshine Highway'. Andrew Zimmern travels across the globe to try the world's most exotic foods. He visits markets and restaurants to sample incredible and whacky cuisines.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods With Andrew Zimmern
programme.desc: 'S7/E7 - The Underground Railroad'. Andrew Zimmern travels across the globe to try the world's most exotic foods. He visits markets and restaurants to sample incredible and whacky cuisines.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods With Andrew Zimmern
programme.desc: 'S8/E2 - Senegal'. Andrew Zimmern travels across the globe to try the world's most exotic foods. He visits markets and restaurants to sample incredible and unique cuisines.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Around The World
programme.desc: Guy Fieri revisits old favourite eateries with an international flair, including a Latin-inspired joint in Miami and a Denver restaurant with killer Korean BBQ.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Between The Bread
programme.desc: Guy Fieri's always down for a good sandwich, so he checks out a food truck in Nashville churning out cheesy concoctions and a Denver diner dishing up eats from all over the world.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Burgers, Burritos...
programme.desc: 'Triple D Nation: Burgers, Burritos And Biscuits'. Guy Fieri's checking out all kinds of food. In Boulder City, a chili-churning diner is keeping it in the family, and a taqueria in Salt Lake City is cranking out huge burritos.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Chili Three Ways
programme.desc: Guy Fieri crosses the border to Vancouver, BC, to see if a Chinese joint's chicken dish is as spicy as it sounds. Plus, he heads south to sample brisket chili in Atlanta.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Flavortown Favorites
programme.desc: Guy Fieri revisits some of the best of Flavortown, from a noodle house in San Diego to a neighbourhood bistro in New Orleans and an award-winning BBQ joint in Iowa.

programme.title: Triple D Nation: Fried And Smoked
programme.desc: Outside San Antonio, Guy Fieri has his mind blown by some fried food. Next, things are smoking with an appetizer made with smoked fish and in Des Moines, a smoked duck special.

programme.title: Baker's Dozen
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Glazed And Confused'. The bakers decorate oversized doughnuts. Guest judge Gemma Stafford challenges the three finalists to create the ultimate breakfast dessert.

programme.title: Best Baker In America
programme.desc: 'S3/E5 - Themed Desserts: Toy Story 4'. The five remaining bakers make Toy Story-themed mini desserts. They then must replicate Toy Story 4 characters in cake.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S6/E17 - Mississippi Delta'. Andrew explores the iconic soul food of the Mississippi Delta. Fried catfish, hushpuppies, smothered oxtails and mud pie all have a definite soul soothing power.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S6/E18 - Key West'. Andrew Zimmern delights in fresh and funky flavours of Florida's food, made with local ingredients. On the menu: conch fritters, coconut shrimp, Key lime pie and more.

programme.title: Bizarre Foods: Delicious Destinations
programme.desc: 'S6/E19 - Quito'. Andrew Zimmern explores culinary diversity in Ecuador's capital by tasting its classic dishes: fried pork and potato cakes, ceviche, sugared peanuts, fish soup and more.

programme.title: Must Try Asia
programme.desc: 'S1/E5 - Hong Kong, China'. In Hong Kong, Sarah and Malcolm search for the city's best dim sum. They visit a traditional eatery before trying a dim sum high-tea menu.

programme.title: Must Try Asia
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia'. On the hunt for Kuala Lumpur's must-try dish, nasi lemak, Sarah rushes to a famed eatery before the popular dish gets sold out.

programme.title: Super Mega Cakes
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Alien Invasion'. In the final, the teams make alien invasion cakes. Next, 50 cake fans decide which of the six winning cakes will take home the $40,000 grand prize.

programme.title: Guy's Grocery Games
programme.desc: 'S34/E4 - Wilderness Chefs'. Three wilderness chefs hunt through Flavortown Market to make fireside favourites and an elevated backcountry dinner for a chance to win $20,000.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: 'S52/E3 - Deli Duel'. Four delicatessen pros attempt to prove that they know more than just sandwiches. They start with a combo platter and a fruit with a cult following.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives
programme.desc: 'S40/E1 - Fistful Of Flavor'. Guy Fieri grabs fistfuls of flavour at a Mediterranean spot in California, a beachy bistro in New Jersey and an Argentine joint in Indianapolis.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives
programme.desc: 'S40/E2 - From Breakfast To The Boot'. Guy Fieri hits up a brunch bonanza in Columbus, Ohio, elevated eats in Boston and a taste of Italy in San Luis Obispo, California.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out

programme.desc: 'S10/E26 - The Wild Wild Vests'. The oldest facility in Los Angeles is where the newest buyers make their debut. Brandi and Jarrod try to piece their way to a win.

programme.desc: 'S4/E7 - Alliens And Big Foot'. People in many lands have claimed to see the footprints of giant ape-men. What if, as ancient astronaut theorists believe, there is evidence to connect Bigfoot with an alien species?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: 'S4/E8 - The Einstein Factor'. Could the genius of Albert Einstein be linked to a different world? Experts examine famous historical figures such as Albert Einstein, Galileo, Archimedes and Aristotle.

programme.title: Truthseekers
programme.desc: 'S2/E7 - El Dorado: Gold, Guns & Greed'. El Dorado, the legendary city of gold, captivated Europeans in the 16th and 17th centuries, sparking endless quests for hidden treasures.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island
programme.desc: 'S12/E28 - Drilling Down: The Mystery Deepens'. After another year of incredible finds on Oak Island, Matty Blake gets the ultimate insider's scoop from Rick, Marty and their team.

programme.title: Footprints Of Civilisation
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Architecture'. Series exploring how the Inca, Mesopotamian, Persian, Greek, Chinese, Egyptian, Roman and Indus civilisations have all left their mark on the modern world.

programme.title: Footprints Of Civilisation
programme.desc: 'S1/E2 - Science And Technology'. Series exploring how the Inca, Mesopotamian, Persian, Greek, Chinese, Egyptian, Roman and Indus civilisations have all left their mark on the modern world.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: 'S1/E1 - Bradshaw Ranch'. Investigators Andy Bustamante and Paul Beban investigate Bradshaw Ranch in Sedona, AZ, and encounter dangerous radiation levels, a strange temperature anomaly, and a UAP.

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: 'S10/E6 of 16 - Chef's Special'. Four smiths are tasked with forging a chef's knife. After a round of testing performed by a chef, only two head back to their home forge to build a brutal hog splitter.

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: 'S10/E7 of 16 - Springtime For Napoleon'. Four smiths must forge signature blades from the metal found in household items. After a couple of rounds, two smiths head to their home forges to recreate the Napoleon Presentation Saber.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: 'S24/E20 - Chum Goes To Hollywood'. Rick tackles a football helmet signed by 28 Heisman Trophy winners - but can he manage to get the seller's price a touch down?

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E27 - Out Of The Frying Pan Am'. The buyers hit Dan's home town, and the Vegas Ladies' locker really takes off. Kenny's purchase sets his wallet alight.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E28 - Some Don't Like It Hot'. It's the hottest day ever in Riverside and Kenny starts seeing things. Ivy gives Mary a boost, while Shana and Edwina stumble across their own paradise.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E29 - Season Of The Kitch'. In Victorville, Brandi and Jarrod's mischievous side emerges. Ivy grabs a locker that no one else can tolerate, while Mary puts the new guy in his place.

programme.title: Secrets In The Jungle
programme.desc: 'S1/E10 - Mystery Of Mexico's Skull Cave'. In Mexico, dozens of skulls and bones are found on a cave floor. Strange grass covered domes are investigated in the Philippines. Carved stone figures are discovered in Hawaii.

programme.title: Discovered By Disaster
programme.desc: 'S1/E4'. Each episode combines CGI, expert testimony, and location shooting to examine extraordinary finds brought to light by disasters ranging from earthquakes and volcanic eruptions to droughts and floods.

programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Society'. From the origins of Democracy in Athens to the Roman Senate, from the Olympic spirit to early Multiculturalism, the Ancient world could be socially sophisticated. Yet there are two sides to that story.

programme.desc: 'S1/E4 - Agriculture'. Once our ancestors began to settle in communities, harvest crops and tend to livestock, they could feed and clothe themselves and cultivate a civil society. Without agriculture, there would be no culture.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: 'S4/E9 - Aliens And Cover-Ups'. In 1980, three young military men were sent into a UK forest to investigate strange lights, and were ordered never to speak about the incident. Why do such UFO encounters continue to be hidden?

programme.title: Secrets In The Jungle
programme.desc: 'S1/E10 - Mystery Of Mexico's Skull Cave'. In Mexico, dozens of skulls and bones are found on a cave floor. Strange grass covered domes are investigated in the Philippines. Carved stone figures are discovered in Hawaii.

programme.title: Beyond Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: 'S1/E2 - MT. Wilson Ranch'. Andy and Paul travel to Nevada, and investigate Mt. Wilson, a property once owned by Robert Bigelow and thought to contain mysterious tunnels that lead to a buried UFO.

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: 'S10/E10 of 16 - Beat The Unbeaten: Conquering The Kachin Dao'. Two previous champions battle it out for the chance to compete against one of our titans of the forge: Jesse Hu, Collin Sage, or Ben Abbott.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: 'S24/E23 - The Mad Pawner'. Rick takes a trip down the rabbit hole after a seller hops in with a first edition of 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.' Will it make Rick grin like the Cheshire Cat, or drive him mad?

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E30 - A Metaphoric Layer Of True Romanticism'. Ivy takes it to the house in nearby Lancaster, while Dave takes advantage of being so close to Ivy. Meanwhile, Justin pushes all of Rene's buttons, and comes out ahead.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E31 - Kumba Yuuup!'. The ladies from Vegas meet Dave, who promptly takes their locker away, leaving them only scraps.

programme.title: Storage Wars
programme.desc: 'S10/E32 - Vegas Shrugged'. The Ladies from Vegas try out their own bidding style. Brandi & Jarrod try to phone it in, while Kenny and his brother show everyone that family comes second.

programme.title: Looting History
programme.desc: 'S1/E8 - A Deal With The Devil: Hitler's Museum Of Stolen Art'. The search of a flat in Munich reveals how Cornelius Gurlitt's part-Jewish father, Hildebrand, became an art dealer for Adolf Hitler.

programme.title: Pharaohs At War
programme.desc: 'S1/E3 - Ptolemy IV - The Battle Of Raphia'. Pharaoh Ptolemy IV confronted Antiochos the Great at Raphia. In this issue, we discover the naval and military strategy of the Ptolemies and the dramatic consequences of this war.

programme.title: Footprints Of Civilisation
programme.desc: 'S1/E5 - Communication'. From Egyptian Hieroglyphics to Emojis, from texting to sending a marathon runner in Classical Greece, the story of communication sheds light on many parallels between the Ancient world and our own.

programme.title: Footprints Of Civilisation
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - Art And Culture'. Series exploring how the Inca, Mesopotamian, Persian, Greek, Chinese, Egyptian, Roman and Indus civilisations have all left their mark on the modern world.

programme.title: Forged In Fire
programme.desc: 'S10/E9 of 16 - Beat The Unbeaten: Mastering The Mystery'. In this special Forged in Fire competition, two previous champions go head to head in a 5-hour forging round making their own signature 'can mai' blades.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: 'S24/E23 - The Mad Pawner'. Rick takes a trip down the rabbit hole after a seller hops in with a first edition of 'Alice's Adventures in Wonderland.' Will it make Rick grin like the Cheshire Cat, or drive him mad?

programme.title: Kasi Car Culture
programme.desc: 'S2/E9'. Sbu meets up with Nana Zulu co-founder of Lokshin Motor show, and they chat about the business of motoring events. Our classics from this week are from KZN as we hung out with Tony.

programme.title: IGNITION GT
programme.desc: 'S25/E32'. Kia's flagship SUV gets a new lease of life. The Volkswagen T-Cross receives a mid-life model update, and we get reacquainted with Omoda's highly popular C5.

programme.title: #CarClipz
programme.desc: 'S3/E2'. This week on CarClipz, we hit the streets we might call the popo. Diving into the road with girls' fun. And ending off with some show-offs.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: 'S1/E5'. Beauties like the Corvette, Mustang, Camaro or Shelby Cobra represent the American dream of freedom. These spectacular cars excite enthusiasts since the 1950s.

programme.title: Auto Mundial
programme.desc: 'S25/E32'. Renault gives the for the splashy heroics. We've got another special Ferrari supercar, but only certain people can buy it. It's a happy 50th for Britain's favourite small executive saloon.

programme.title: Rev
programme.desc: 'S25/E32'. Fiat's retro Grande Panda debuts. REV tests it and rides with an average German. MONOCAB nears production. Drones now carry lab samples from clinic to lab.

programme.title: Le Mans Classic
programme.desc: Le Mans Classic is a biennial vintage sports car event. We celebrate the centenary of the Le Mans 24 Hours, exhibitions everywhere and an extra-ordinary atmosphere.

programme.title: Astron Energy Volkswagen Polo Cup
programme.desc: 'S1/E5'. The 5th round of the Astron Energy VW Polo Cup took place at the fast and furious East London Grand Prix Circuit. With action plenty the crowds were thrilled with some great racing.

programme.title: The Ultimate Rider
programme.desc: 'S2/E3'. It's Week 3 and the rookies start the day in a Start Skills session with the legend himself, Daryl Beattie. The rookies race each other to find a contender to take on Daryl.

programme.title: Auto Exotica
programme.desc: 'S2/E2'. McLaren, famed for F1 and supercars, now makes a GT. Brian and Rieck test its comfort vs. sport, while Jennifer compares it to the race-bred McLaren 620R.

programme.title: #CarClipz
programme.desc: 'S3/E3'. We welcome this week's CarClipz episode with engine aura. Take a walk in the park imagining our easy life. Ending the episode by being at home sweet home.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. Power limousines like the BMW M5, Mercedes-AMG E63, Audi RS6 and Mulsanne Speed offer a unique mix of style, performance and suitability for daily use.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: 'S8/E4'. Ian takes on a new build while attempting to wrap up Victor's fantasy show car, the two vehicles headed in opposite directions, Ian's got to bring the goods and steer the projects.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: 'S3/E23'. A cruise over the Alps to Italy in a Maserati GranCabrio MC. A Brit with a fiery temperament, the Jaguar XK-RS convertible with 550 hp. Mercedes AMG's SL models.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.desc: 'S3/E24'. Luxury class grand tourers with four doors. Porsche introduced their Panamera as a Plugin Hybrid or equipped with new turbo engines. BMW responded with their M6 Gran Coupe.

programme.title: ALL THINGS MOTORING
programme.desc: 'S10/E2'. Season finale. Mike attends Alfa Romeo Rosso Track Day, and Ernest takes part in the CHD Tracktion drift racing event. This is a show with slides and smiles.

programme.title: The Bike Show
programme.desc: 'S25/E33'. This week on The Bike Show, is the new R 12 G/S BMW's newest off-road machine, Suzuki launches a new superbike, and we all get stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Fifth Gear Recharged
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. Vicki and Rory test all the latest affordable city EV cars for speed and practicality. Plus, Jimmy heads to Scotland to try out a prototype off-road machine.

programme.title: Kasi Car Culture
programme.desc: 'S2/E10'. Sbu is at Auto Bike Saloon to find out what's it about. Monde Hashe, founder of wheelz 'n smoke, lets Mo have a feel of his Nissan Skyline. Mo hangs out with the Mayor of Tshwane and his crew, The Old School Car Club.

programme.title: IGNITION GT
programme.desc: 'S25/E33'. IGNITION GT gives you the lowdown on the latest and hottest new cars releases from our local market, but also from the international circuit.

programme.title: OvaLandr
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. 'Class in session' - ahead of their adventure, the ladies get behind the wheel of their vehicles for a day out on the 4x4 course figuring out 'what does this button do'.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - 1/6'. How do you soften a car for a crash stunt? How do you jump from a high building? The Stunt Heroes let you take a peek behind the curtains of their preparations.

programme.title: Full Custom Garage
programme.desc: 'S8/E4'. Ian takes on a new build while attempting to wrap up Victor's fantasy show car, the two vehicles headed in opposite directions, Ian's got to bring the goods and steer the projects.

programme.title: IGNITION Goes To SEMA
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. In the second instalment, Vic feasts his eyes on a pimped Volkswagen Beetle, a restored and enhanced 1970s Toyota Corolla and a two-door Ford Sierra with modern mechanicals.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: 'S2/E11'. Janice rushes to finish her 1960 Land Rover project, Larry and Ron diagnose a 1948 Delahaye misfire, and Greg struggles reinstalling a serviced engine in a 1991 Alfa Romeo.

programme.title: Auto Mundial
programme.desc: 'S25/E33'. The 1000 bonkers Chevrolet Corvette Z R1 gets an even bigger boost. We've also got a Ford pickup truck for late night street racers. It doubles as your daily workhorse.

programme.title: Rev
programme.desc: 'S25/E33'. We test the new Audi S e-tron G. Removing barriers to EV use to reduce carbon footprints in Brazil and Costa Rica. And thrilling the fans with the sport of drifting in Nigeria!

programme.title: Tuned In SA
programme.desc: 'S2/E6'. Chad hits the track in two power-packed GTIs. And Deon sees what a bit of decaling can do for some Porsches.

programme.title: Tuned In SA
programme.desc: 'S2/E7'. We turn our backs on the Germans as Chad takes to the tar in a modified Mazda RX-7. Deon embraces the stars-and-stripes with a customised Chevrolet El Camino.

programme.title: Toyota Gazoo Racing SA Cup
programme.desc: 'S25/E5'. Competitors participating in the Toyota Gazoo Racing GR Cup had not visited the East London Grand Prix Circuit, so it was a real eye opener for all in the fifth round of the series.

programme.title: Trackside: Motocross of Nations
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. Motocross of Nations is the sport's Olympics, with 37 nations competing. Team South Africa brings top riders. Meet legends Carmichael & Villopoto trackside.

programme.title: ALL THINGS MOTORING
programme.desc: 'S10/E2'. Season finale. Mike attends Alfa Romeo Rosso Track Day, and Ernest takes part in the CHD Tracktion drift racing event. This is a show with slides and smiles.

programme.desc: 'S8/E4'. Ian takes on a new build while attempting to wrap up Victor's fantasy show car, the two vehicles headed in opposite directions, Ian's got to bring the goods and steer the projects.

programme.title: Bangers & Cash
programme.desc: 'S4/E11'. Derek picks up Swedish models, a Saab 96L and Volvo P1800ES. A British AC Aceca sports car comes up for sale and a pooch makes an audacious auction bid for an American hot dog van.

programme.title: Cape Route Rally
programme.desc: 'S1/E14'. The Cape Route Rally crew journey across the Northern Cape. Drifting dunes and granite climb to a brutal ascent of the legendary Impassible Pass, it's 3 days of extreme 4x4 action.

programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. In the second instalment, Vic feasts his eyes on a pimped Volkswagen Beetle, a restored and enhanced 1970s Toyota Corolla and a two-door Ford Sierra with modern mechanicals.

programme.title: The Guild Garage
programme.desc: 'S2/E11'. Janice rushes to finish her 1960 Land Rover project, Larry and Ron diagnose a 1948 Delahaye misfire, and Greg struggles reinstalling a serviced engine in a 1991 Alfa Romeo.

programme.title: Tuned In SA
programme.desc: 'S2/E6'. Chad hits the track in two power-packed GTIs. And Deon sees what a bit of decaling can do for some Porsches.

programme.title: Tuned In SA
programme.desc: 'S2/E7'. We turn our backs on the Germans as Chad takes to the tar in a modified Mazda RX-7. Deon embraces the stars-and-stripes with a customised Chevrolet El Camino.

programme.title: Cape Route Rally
programme.desc: 'S1/E14'. The Cape Route Rally crew journey across the Northern Cape. Drifting dunes and granite climb to a brutal ascent of the legendary Impassible Pass, it's 3 days of extreme 4x4 action.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: 'S25/E33'. Buyer's Guide brings you a panel of motoring experts in the motoring industry and is here to guide you through your next vehicle purchase.

programme.title: Fifth Gear Recharged
programme.desc: 'S1/E2'. Vicki and Rory test all the latest affordable city EV cars for speed and practicality. Plus, Jimmy heads to Scotland to try out a prototype off-road machine.

programme.title: OvaLandr
programme.desc: 'S1/E1'. 'Class in session' - ahead of their adventure, the ladies get behind the wheel of their vehicles for a day out on the 4x4 course figuring out 'what does this button do'.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: 'S1/E6 - 1/6'. How do you soften a car for a crash stunt? How do you jump from a high building? The Stunt Heroes let you take a peek behind the curtains of their preparations.

programme.title: The Ultimate Rider
programme.desc: 'S2/E4'. The rookies race side by side against each other in pairs. The pressure is on as the judges decide there will be surprise elimination. The rookies won't know until the points are revealed later in the day.

programme.title: Auto Exotica
programme.desc: 'S2/E3'. England's iconic brands shine as hosts explore the stylish Lotus Evora GT and Aston Martin's first SUV, the DBX, blending performance with elegance.

programme.title: #CarClipz
programme.desc: 'S3/E3'. We welcome this week's CarClipz episode with engine aura. Take a walk in the park imagining our easy life. Ending the episode by being at home sweet home.

programme.title: Dreamcars
programme.desc: 'S1/E6'. Power limousines like the BMW M5, Mercedes-AMG E63, Audi RS6 and Mulsanne Speed offer a unique mix of style, performance and suitability for daily use.

programme.title: Kasi Car Culture
programme.desc: 'S2/E10'. Sbu is at Auto Bike Saloon to find out what's it about. Monde Hashe, founder of wheelz 'n smoke, lets Mo have a feel of his Nissan Skyline. Mo hangs out with the Mayor of Tshwane and his crew, The Old School Car Club.

programme.desc: 'S1/E107 of 156 - Finding A New Voice'. Ronald brings peace under ground. Nandipha lets go of her old life. Lucky wants to buy the spaza shop. Olwethu is inspired to be her own woman. Things get confusing between Israel, May and Thuli.

programme.title: Ashes To Ashes
programme.desc: 'S1/E17 - 1/17'. Selo has evidently failed to tie up loose ends. Violet is chuffed when she receives a gift from Tsietsi after weeks of tiresome efforts.

programme.title: Net 20 Minute
programme.desc: 'S1/E25'. Ali sets Necmettin and Sureyya up to find out more about Onder's death. Melek's plan to escape is made more complicated.

programme.title: Robogobo
programme.desc: 'S1/E9 - Water Wheel Steal, The/ We Got the Tweet'. Dax, Allie, and Hopper use toys to save Gimme Pig from a giant water wheel. When Mönkey Wrënch takes away RoboGobo's speaking ability, Booster plays charades to rescue songbirds.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: 'S2/E50 - Stolen Web-quarters/Spideys in Space!'. Robot villain Zola takes over WEB-Quarters, and Team Spidey must decide whether to destroy it to save the city. Team Spidey goes to the moon in their new web-spinner suits!

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: 'S2/E51 - Hide & Seek/Whale of a Time'. Team Spidey and the Thing stop Gobby from using invisibility to cause trouble in the city. Team Spidey must stop Doc Ock's mechanical whale from disrupting the real whales.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E79 - Movies'. It's Bluey's first trip to the cinema, but she's worried the movie will be too scary. When Bingo starts running amok in the theatre, she must conquer her fear and help Dad out.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E80 - Grandad'. Grandad is supposed to be resting, but when Bluey and Bingo go to visit him, he makes a run for it with the kids and takes them on a madcap adventure into the bush.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E81 - Library'. When Muffin is told that she is special by her dad, she interprets it as an excuse to do anything she wants, which means playing Bluey and Bingo's game of library her way.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E82 - Swim School'. Mum, Dad and Bingo must complete both their classes to pass Swim School but pleasing strict Big Fish instructor Margaret (aka Bluey) is proving very difficult.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E83 - Bin Night'. Bluey, Bingo and Dad always take out the bins.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E84 - Ice Cream'. Bluey and Bingo want a lick of each other's ice cream. But they are so focused on making sure each lick is fair, they don't notice their ice creams are melting.

programme.title: Meet Iron Man and His Awesome Friends
programme.desc: 'S1/E8 - Meet Black Panther'. When Swarm uses her robotic slime bug to make a mess of Stark Expo, it's up to Iron Man and Black Panther to rescue the visitors and save the day.

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: 'S1/E24 - The Superkitties and the Blueberry Bonanza'. When Amara brings a lost puppy to the Purr 'N' Play, Bitsy wonders if there will be enough attention for her. The SuperKitties must stop whoever stole Abraca Dan's magic tricks.

programme.title: Superkitties
programme.desc: 'S1/E25 - The Superkitties and the Lab Rat Lift-off'. When Bitsy accidentally clones herself with Lab Rat's new invention, the team must stop the Bitsies. Zsa-Zsa steals the SuperKitty Kit, so she doesn't have to practice flying.

programme.title: Spidey and His Amazing Friends
programme.desc: 'S2/E53 - How to Train Your Doggy/Dome Alone'. Gobby and Rhino steal teleporting pup Lockjaw, in hopes of making him an accomplice. When Zola traps The Thing, Spidey and Ghost-Spider under a dome, Spin must save the day!

programme.title: Mickey Mouse Funhouse
programme.desc: 'S2/E39 - Ready to Play, Ruthie!/Goofy Dogs!'. When a new player who won't share causes his players to quit, Pete calls the gang to play a baseball game. Goofy helps Lunar Clarabelle learn to make hot dogs.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E85 - Bad Mood'. Bingo is playing Bad Mood with Dad, standing on his feet as Dad stomps around the house, controlling everything Bingo does and causing chaos.

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E86 - Double Babysitter'. Two babysitters turn up to look after Bluey and Bingo!

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: 'S2/E87 - The Quiet Game'. Bluey and Bingo are playing The Quiet Game and won't use words to tell Dad which toy to buy. At his wits end, Dad recruits new store clerk Alfie to help interpret the miming.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: 'S2/E40 - Easter Wolfies/Luna & the Wolfies'. The Wolfy kids try to steal the Easter eggs. Luna Girl lets the Wolfies steal her moon magnet.

programme.title: PJ Masks
programme.desc: 'S2/E41 - Catboy No More/Gekko Vs Splatcano'. Romeo steals Catboy's powers while wearing his costume. Can Gekko help Catboy and Owlette stop Night Ninja?

programme.title: Takalani Sesame
programme.desc: 'S7/E3 - Expert'. Our friends learn all about the word 'Expert'. Zikwe learns about the different kinds of experts to fix different kinds of things. We also meet pottery experts in Limpopo.

programme.title: Takalani Sesame
programme.desc: 'S7/E4 - Magnify'. The word on Takalani Sesame is 'Magnify'. Our friends play Pirates and go on a treasure hunt! We also travel to KwaZulu Natal to find out how we can use tools to make things bigger.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: 'S12/E3 of 13 - Red Hot Chilli Nibbles'. It's Malcolm's first day in Pontypandy, but Bronwyn's welcome party nibbles burn out a bit too fiery for everyone's tastes.

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: 'S2/E14 of 52 - The Tale of Cotton-tail's Treetop Tumble'. After Old Brown snatches her, Cotton-tail gets stuck up a tree.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and The Mushables
programme.desc: 'S2/E26 - The Big Wild Day'. Mush-Mush goes on an adventure with Morel and Sushi-Mushi. He worries he won't be cool enough to fit in with the older Mushables, so makes Chep come along for support.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and The Mushables
programme.desc: 'S2/E27 - Full Moon Moves'. Lilit loves dancing. The only Mushable she hasn't danced with is Amanita. But Amanita doesn't dance. Can Lilit get her dancing?

programme.desc: 'S1/E19 of 52 - Shame Of Thrones'. A series of accidents finds Elliot being crowned King of the Deers, instead of Ian, who was expecting the honour.

programme.desc: Dr Bob and Margaret Rodgers are pastors of Evangel World Prayer Center in Louisville, KY.

programme.title: The Lance Wallnau Show

programme.title: Charles Vance on Empowered Television
programme.desc: 'S1'. Join us for teachings on how to make faith a reality.

programme.title: TIME with Denise Renner
programme.desc: 'S1'. Join Denise Rennerasshe shares from her heart biblical truths from God's Word and how to apply them in everyday life. Her practical presentation of the Word will certainly stir your faith and love for the Lord.

programme.title: Katherine Ruonala
programme.desc: 'S1'. Katherine Ruonala has a prophetic and healing ministry and travels internationally as a conference speaker bringing a message of love and hope to the nations.

programme.title: Glory Road TV Show
programme.desc: The Glory Road TV show help you connect with heaven and the glory of the Lord to activate the spiritual gifts, purpose and destiny in your life.

programme.title: The Elena & Natalia Show
programme.desc: Twin TV hosts, Elena & Natalia Maranian, engage in heartfelt, transparent conversations about Jesus, life, and love centered on the beauty and truth of God's Word.

programme.title: Turning Point

programme.title: Tree Of Life
programme.desc: Join Benjamin Conway as he shares powerful truths about God's goodness, grace and healing power. He will teach you how to dream big, inspire you to dream, and challenge you to walk in your dreams.

programme.title: Planetshakers TV
programme.desc: A television program birthed out of the desire to empower generations to win generations. Join Pastors Russell and Sam Evans each week as they bring an encouraging and uplifting Bible based message.

programme.title: SMI with Nicky and Lillian
programme.desc: Get equipped and activated for the Kingdom of God is not just in word, but in power. Nicky and Lillian van der Westhuizen's mission is to activate this generation in the Supernatural Power of God.

programme.title: Answers With Bayless Conley
programme.desc: Bayless Conley is known for his clear presentation of the Bible message and the way he applies it to everyday life. His unique background and remarkable story enables him to reach a diverse global audience.

programme.title: The Apostolic Voice
programme.desc: 'S1'. The Apostolic Voice with Mark Kauffman, shares insights and truths, empowering viewers to grow in their knowledge of Christ, understand their identity and purpose in Christ and their role in His Kingdom.

programme.title: Choose Life

programme.desc: 'S1 - Humanity's Last Hope. Do You Believe the True Gospel?'. Christian viewers are inspired to live their lives according to Christian ideals and continue walking in their faith.

programme.title: Manna-Fest

programme.title: Faith Church - Buffalo City

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship news programme delivers the latest world news, business and weather with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony
programme.desc: Discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda - here the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule as a sanctuary of local culture and history.

programme.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Admired since ancient times for their beauty, Japanese swords are amazing works of art - this time, one of the 'five greatest swords under heaven': Mikazuki Munechika.

programme.title: Magical Japanese
programme.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history, and culture - this episode looks at words related to the colour red. Explore the unique culture behind them.

programme.title: Culture Crossroads
programme.desc: This programme provides information for a multicultural society - we cover interesting topics from various angles such as Japanese local movements for the Tokyo Olympics and disaster preparedness.

programme.title: Hello! NHK World-Japan
programme.desc: We introduce the contents and activities of NHK World-Japan to make the channel and its programmes known to more people - this is the window of the station to the world!

programme.title: Short Programme
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan presents a variety of short programmes focusing on Japan and Asia.

programme.title: Hometown Stories
programme.desc: Mito Kosei was exposed to radiation in the womb when an atomic bomb exploded over Hiroshima - he's been a volunteer guide for 20 years or so telling foreign visitors the truth about the bombing.

programme.title: TV Mozambique Internacional
programme.desc: O canal é uma plataforma para unir os moçambicanos em todo o mundo e também tem como objectivo focar na cultura, turismo, desporto e informações sobre o país para os moçambicanos residentes no exterior.
